value:
$nMPID_フロリーナ|A ninja festival? I wonder if I can
succeed here... Maybe I should just
hide somewhere? Oh, I'm anxious...

$nMPID_リン|Subterfuge and information gathering
are not my usual strong points, but
I'm happy to give all this a try.

$nMPID_フロリーナ|Lyn, are you all right with so much of
your legs exposed? Aren't you cold?
I'm shivering just looking at you!

$nMPID_リン|Ninja garb is quite the new look
for you! I'd like to see you flying
around on Huey wearing that.

$nMPID_フロリーナ|Being together like this reminds
me of the Lyndis's Legion days.
I remember our time fondly.

$nMPID_リン|Infiltration successful. We're inside
$Nu's castle...$k$pWe've been detected!

$nMPID_リン|We've nearly mastered the art
of stealth. Keep it up, Florina!

$nMPID_フロリーナ|All right, Lady Lyndis! Oh! ...Was that
too loud? I'll be more stealthy.

$nMPID_リン|Do not worry, Florina! We'll do better
next time, I'm sure!

$nMPID_フロリーナ|Lady Lyndis, we've been given
a new ninja art! We are stronger
than ever now!

I am Lyn, and this is Florina.
We are h— Oh, wait. Was that
a proper ninja greeting?$k$p...Do ninja have special greetings?

$nMPID_リン|Ha-tah! ...Saiii-YAH!$k$pWhat do you think, Florina?
I'm beginning to look the part
of the ninja, don't you think?$k$p$nMPID_フロリーナ|Yes! You have incredible technique,
Lady Lyndis! You looked just like
a real ninja.$k$pOf course, I don't really know all
that much about real ninja, but...$k$p$nMPID_リン|Thank you all the same. Now, why
not join me, Florina? Don't be shy!$k$pWe should make the most of our
time at the festival. The experience
could prove to be invaluable.$k$p$nMPID_フロリーナ|I don't know how, but...if you're
enjoying yourself, then I'm happy.
Let's just do the best we can!
それっ
仕留める！
きゃあっ
しくじったわ…
$nMPID_二人|You're finished!
$nMPID_二人|This is it! Yes! What she said!
$nMPID_リン|Accept your punishment.
$nMPID_フロリーナ|Prepare yourself!
Waaahh!
But...our mission...
Go for it!
Lyn, you're a wonder!
"Think you can beat us?" "Think again!"
"Lyn, I'm not sure I can—" "Courage, Florina."
Hey!
"Are you hurt?" "No—I'm all right."
This way?
At your command.
Shh! Not so loud!

$nMPID_フロリーナ|Hey, Lyn. What can you tell me
about ninja?

$nMPID_リン|They are a type of warrior who
uses stealth.$k$pI'm told they originated centuries
ago in the Kingdom of Hoshido.

They are keepers of secret combat
arts, honed and passed down over
generations of masters and disciples.
$nMPID_フロリーナ|Huh, that's interesting! But...
$nMPID_リン|But what?

$nMPID_フロリーナ|For warriors who are supposed to
be quiet, the design of these outfits
seems kinda...loud.

$nMPID_リン|Hm, you raise a good point. Though
I will say, they're certainly easy to
move around in.

$nMPID_フロリーナ|Well, sure. With so little protection,
you have to be light on your feet to
evade attacks and stay out of sight.

Anyway! Guess it's time to change
back into our regular clothes, huh?

$nMPID_リン|Oh, did I not mention? These outfits
are designed for stealth.$k$pThe plan is to sneak into the enemy
stronghold and gather intelligence.

$nMPID_フロリーナ|That sounds a little…scary. I don't
think I'm ready for that!

$nMPID_リン|Florina. A ninja must be self-assured.
Are you harboring doubts?

$nMPID_フロリーナ|Yes! I mean...no! As long as we go
together, I suppose it'll be all right.

$nMPID_リン|I'm afraid that's not an option. You
must go alone. Otherwise the risk of
enemy detection would be too great.

$nMPID_フロリーナ|Fine, then! As of now, I quit
being a ninja.

$nMPID_リン|Relax, Florina! I'm kidding. We're only
wearing these outfits for the festival.

$nMPID_フロリーナ|Oh... Ha, you really had me going
there, Lyn. That's...so funny...
